Subskills.name: Desert Mix
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of sand thrown.

Subskills.name: Concentrated Sand
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by sand carver.

Subskills.name: Eviscerate
Subskills.description: Critical strikes cause the nomad to throw sand in a circle around him stunning and dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Glass Shards
Subskills.description: Thrown sand has a chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Special Pouch
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt to bosses by sand carver.

Subskills.name: Vortex Master
Subskills.description: Chance on kill to spawn a small sand vortex.

Subskills.name: Combat Skills
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to gain increased dodge chance for a short period.

Subskills.name: Swift Strikes
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using sand carver.

Subskills.name: Desert's Blade
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to summon a big tornado pulling in and dealing additional damage to nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Raw Power
Subskills.description: Increases attack damage dealt by sand carver.

Subskills.name: Headwind
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of sand thrown.

Subskills.name: Sand Infusion
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break and arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Parasitical Sand
Subskills.description: Thrown sand now sticks to the targets dealing damage over time for a short period.

Subskills.name: Piercing Sands
Subskills.description: Thrown sand is now piercing and has a chance to fork on hit.
